jdbcService.sql: insert into node_audits ( id, created, modified, actor_id, description, user_device_id, host, error_code, error_log, parent_id, device_id, action_id, audit_level_id, node_id ) values ( :id, :created, :modified, :actorId, :description, :userDeviceId, :host, :errorCode, :errorLog, :parentId, :deviceId, :actionId, :auditLevelId, :nodeId )
